Americans own thousands of spe - cialised tools that address nearly every human require - ment, however obscure.
美国人拥有涉及到人类几乎各项需要的专用器具, 不论这种需要多么微不足道.
Bilateral treaty: Formal binding agree - ment between two states.
双边条约是指两个国家之间正式的有约束力的协议.
Participate the bid as well as technical treaty negotiation and sign ment?

At last the base ment was quiet.
地下室终于安静了下来.
